Methods in thep.paillier that return EncryptedInteger
 EncryptedInteger EncryptedInteger.add(java.math.BigInteger other)
          Adds a constant to the encrypted integer
 EncryptedInteger EncryptedInteger.add(EncryptedInteger other)
          Adds one encrypted integer to this encrypted integer Note, if you are using r returned from the set(BigInteger) method, you can compute the r for the sum of two encrypted integers by multiplying the r values and taking the result mod pub.getNSquared().
 EncryptedInteger EncryptedPolynomial.evaluate(java.math.BigInteger point)
          Evaluates an encrypted polynomial at the given point
 EncryptedInteger[] EncryptedPolynomial.getCoefficients()
          Returns the encrypted coefficients which make up the polynomial
 EncryptedInteger EncryptedInteger.multiply(java.math.BigInteger other)
          Multiplies the encrypted integer by a constant
